author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Apax Global Posts FY Adjusted NAV Per Share Of 1.86 Euros
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Apax Global Alpha Ltd:
* ‍ADJUSTED NAV DECREASED BY EUR 26.3M TO EUR 912.4M DURING 12 MONTHS TO 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍SECOND SEMI-ANNUAL DIVIDEND OF 4.17 PENCE PER SHARE DECLARED​
* FY ADJUSTED NAV PER SHARE OF EUR 1.86 (£1.65), COMPARED TO EUR 1.91 (£1.63) AT 31 DECEMBER 2016​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
